meanings: with this excuse and that excuse

vlive.korean: 하긴 이건 핑계다 내가 많이 찍었어야지 그렇지? But the excuse is that I should have taken a lot, right? 듣기 View video GFRIEND : 오주년이 얼마 안남아따
vlive.english: But the excuse is that I should have taken a lot, right?

vlive.korean: 휴가? 그냥 가면 되잖아 휴가가 무슨 핑계야 - 그러니까... Vacation? You could go there. It's not a good excuse. - I mean... 듣기 View video NCT : 5랜10000 2에요💚
vlive.english: Vacation? You could go there. It's not a good excuse. - I mean...

vlive.korean: 홀더 핑계 대고 다시 들어가? 말아? Oh, should I come back to get it or now? 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 단골 카페 알바가 존잘이다! ❤️ [전지적 짝사랑 시점] 특별편
vlive.english: Oh, should I come back to get it or now?

vlive.korean: 초록색 유지하기가... 너무 핑계가 많다 그렇죠? To maintain green... I have so many excuses, right? 듣기 View video 우주소녀(WJSN) : [설아] 전지적 설아 시점👀💕 EP.04 [Seola] Omniscient Seola's View👀💕 EP.04
vlive.english: To maintain green... I have so many excuses, right?

vlive.korean: 살짝 저를 핑계 삼아서 안 하시는 건 아니죠? It's not that you're going to use me as an excuse and not diet, right? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 잠자기전 우진이와 함께 🌛
vlive.english: It's not that you're going to use me as an excuse and not diet, right?

examples.korean: It gave me an excuse to take the car. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 내가 차를 가져갈 핑계거리가 되어 주었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It gave me an excuse to take the car. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He left the party early on the pretext of having work to do. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 할 일이 있다는 핑계를 대고 파티를 일찍 떠났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He left the party early on the pretext of having work to do. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I cannot trust an excusist. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 핑계를 일삼는 사람을 신뢰할 수 없다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I cannot trust an excusist. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Don't give me any ingenious excuses. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나에게 그런 교묘한 핑계들을 대지 마라. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: Don't give me any ingenious excuses. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I need a good excuse to cancel. Help! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 취소할 만한 적당한 핑계거리가 필요한데, 도와줘! DARAKWON
examples.english: I need a good excuse to cancel. Help! Add to Wordbook
